Articles.Content: Hey guys, I've been working on a mod for about a week now (and it's stupid hard!) and I can't figure out what's going wrong (and don't make me ask GregroxMun or Sigma88, they've given up). It's based on Greg's Alien Space Program mods (which are amazing) and it looks like I've got everything right to convert Kerbin to Minmus but it never works! I've quadruple checked the code and compared it to all three existing alien space program mods. Now, I'm turning to the ksp/logs/kopernicus/____.logs and I have no idea how to read most of them. I know it failed to load "Kerbin" (supposed to be Minmus) and just appeared as Kerbin. Does anyone know how to read the rest of a log? Thanks
We gave up because you don't have the prerequisite experience. As I've said before, I'll say again. You gotta learn the basics before jumping into a mod like Alien Space Programs.

35 minutes ago, GregroxMun said:

We gave up because you don't have the prerequisite experience. As I've said before, I'll say again. You gotta learn the basics before jumping into a mod like Alien Space Programs.

But the code looks identical to L/ESP except for obvious stuff like minmus instead of eve and stuff like that
